name: nodebb
tagline: A modern real time forum platform
description: NodeBB is a modern, lightweight forum platform built on Node.js. It supports real-time updates, plugins, SSO, and themes and can be self-hosted or deployed as a managed cloud service.

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with hundreds of community plugins for features and integrations

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Customize appearance with themes or create custom designs with templates

features.title: User Management
features.description: Handle registration, profiles, reputation, and moderation tools

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Optimized interface works seamlessly on phones, tablets, and desktops

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find topics and posts quickly with full-text search and filters
